item.title: Enable submission port 587 in Postfix
item.description: Enabling submission port support for Postfix is really easy. To have postfix listen on both 25 and 587, be sure that the line starting with submission is uncommented in /etc/postfix/master.cf: smtp inet n - n - - smtpd submission inet n - n - - smtpd
